description:
Lynn remembers the time she first met Arne and hired him to help investigate her father`s suspicious behavior.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf jeden Regen folgt auch Sonnenschein. すべての雨のあとには, 日差しが続く
Subete no Ame no Ato ni wa, Hizashi ga Tsuzuku
There Is Always Sunshine After the Rain
